title: Yasuo Bug (R)
body: Im not sure if it's just me but I feel like there's a bug with yasuo at the moment that's been around for many many patches. This happens rarely happens but after doing the ult animation and dealing the damage when you hit the ground you get stuck. You can't move or aa for about .5 - .75 you can definately feel it and it's caused me to lose duels because of it. This also very rarely happens after doing the e+q combo. I dunno someone pl0x look into it {{champion:157}} It's definitely not something riot intended to do because it feels very inconsistent. It also doesn't happen every game so I am not sure it there are specific triggers for this bug.

replies.body: yes it has been for ages, put several requests (along with other bugs they are yet to fix) to fix it in bug board, riot refuses.

Check [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) (there are so many yasuo issues rn), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥
